recipes.name: Vitos crazy recipe
recipes.ingredients:
Poolish:
300gr flour
300gr water
5gr yeast
5gr honey

Dough:
300gr flour
150ml water
10gr salt
recipes.steps:
1. Make the poolish
2. Put the poolish into the fridge for 16h-24h
3. Make big dough ball
4. Rest for 1h
5. Make small dough balls
6. Rest for 1h
7. You are good to go!
recipes.notes: Enough for 4 dough balls. You can increase ingredients according to goal dough ball number, but poolish can work with as it is (no need to increase poolish ingredients).

journal.notes:
Upped to 6 dough balls (600gr flour, 675ml water).
Hydration stayed the same.
Used Manitoba 00 flour.
